Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Nayru's Love#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #Barinade#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Minuet of Forest#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #a Heart Container#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #a Wallet#.
